keyword : small buffer

0x01. Static Analysis

/*
        The Lord of the BOF : The Fellowship of the BOF
        - cobolt
        - small buffer
*/

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    char buffer[16];
    if(argc < 2){
        printf("argv error\n");
        exit(0);
    }
    strcpy(buffer, argv[1]);
    printf("%s\n", buffer);
}
